title: Lesson 1: Classification of Trees and Wood

questions.q: Which classification of trees do hardwoods come from?
Which of the following is a common feature of softwood?
Plywood is a manufactured wood known for its:
options: Thin layers bonded with adhesive under pressure
Ability to shed leaves every year
questions.answer: Thin layers bonded with adhesive under pressure

questions.q: Which manufactured wood is made from wood chips, sawmill shavings, and resin binders?
What is the function of cladding in construction?
options: Provides support as a structural framework
Serves as a walking surface or platform
Strengthens the structure by attaching to framing
Protects the exterior from weather and improves appearance
questions.answer: Protects the exterior from weather and improves appearance
